job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltpgtInsight Global is looking for an eager RampampD focused Data Scientist to join one of our largest Enterprise clients within their Emerging Technology organization and specifically Collaborate with the various teams while an understanding the Quantum Computing initiative Day to day this position has responsibility for evaluating quantum accelerated optimization approaches as well as alternative quantum annealing algorithms for use in optimization scenarios HeShe will implement optimization algorithms on quantum annealing hardware and prototype quantum annealing applications for combinatorial optimization problemsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtThis role will consist of preparing and collecting data sets to be used for testing quantum annealing prototypes and evaluating alternative optimization approaches in comparison to quantum annealing approaches both in graph based and nongraphbased optimization scenariosampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtMusthavesltstronggt ltpgtltulgtltligt3 years in relevant work experience ltligtltligtHands on experience with Jupyter Notebooks ltligtltligtKnowledge working with Python ltligtltligtExperience with QUBO and alternative optimization algorithms ltligtltligtExperience with embedding optimization problems into a topology appropriate for execution on a QPU ltligtltligtA background in combinatorial optimization including working with graph structures ltligtltligtThe ability to critically evaluate the performance of algorithms ltligtltligt Masters Degree or higher Preferably a PhD in similar concentration ltligtltulgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtPlusses ltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtExperience with DWave quantum systems ltligtltulgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtltpgt
